about.me: Hi, I'm Lauris (@StakePool247) from Latvia. I have been with Cardano Project since 2018 and was running this pool already on the ITN testnet. I'm a member of the 'Friends & Family' group as well as a board member of SPOCRA. I believe that Cardano will have a huge impact on the blockchain industry.
about.server: We use state of the art data centers to keep the pools and relays running 24/7 with a focus on security and monitoring to prevent any downtime.
